variables.name: BLOCK_MESSAGE
variables.label: Block Message
variables.help: Message shown to users when content is blocked
variables.default: Content blocked by security policy. Please rephrase without instructing how to respond.

variables.name: ALLOW_MAX
variables.label: Allow.max
variables.help: Maximum threat score (0-100) to allow content without processing. Range: 0-29 (default: 29)

variables.name: SL_MIN
variables.label: Light Sanitize.min
variables.help: Minimum score (0-100) for light sanitization. Should match ALLOW_MAX + 1 (default: 30)

variables.name: SL_MAX
variables.label: Light Sanitize.max
variables.help: Maximum score (0-100) for light sanitization. Range: 30-64 (default: 64)

variables.name: SH_MIN
variables.label: Heavy Sanitize.min
variables.help: Minimum score (0-100) for heavy sanitization. Should match SL_MAX + 1 (default: 65)

variables.name: SH_MAX
variables.label: Heavy Sanitize.max
variables.help: Maximum score (0-100) for heavy sanitization. Range: 65-84 (default: 84)

variables.name: BLOCK_MIN
variables.label: Block.min
variables.help: Minimum score (0-100) to block content entirely. Range: 85-100 (default: 85)

variables.name: BLOOM_ROUTE_TO_AC
variables.label: Bloom route_to_ac_threshold
variables.help: Score (0-100) to trigger additional validation checks. Lower = more sensitive (default: 15)

variables.name: BLOOM_HARD_BLOCK
variables.label: Bloom hard_block_threshold
variables.help: Score (0-100) to immediately block without further analysis. Higher = fewer false positives (default: 50)

variables.name: BLOOM_REQUIRE_EXTRA
variables.label: Require additional signals
variables.help: Require multiple indicators before blocking. Reduces false positives (default: enabled)

variables.name: BLOOM_PHRASE_BONUS
variables.label: Bloom phrase match bonus
variables.help: Points added per matched phrase (0-100)

variables.name: BLOOM_M
variables.label: Bloom filter size (m)
variables.help: Bits allocated for bloom filter. Larger = fewer false positives, more memory (default: 32768)

variables.name: BLOOM_K
variables.label: Bloom hash functions (k)
variables.help: Number of hash functions. More = better accuracy, slower processing (default: 5)

variables.name: REMOVE_ZERO_WIDTH
variables.label: Remove zero-width
variables.help: Strip invisible Unicode characters used for obfuscation. Recommended for security (default: enabled)

variables.name: COLLAPSE_WS
variables.label: Normalize spaces
variables.help: Merge multiple spaces/tabs/newlines. Prevents whitespace obfuscation (default: enabled)

variables.name: DECODE_ENTITIES
variables.label: Decode HTML entities
variables.help: Convert HTML entities (< to <). Essential for web input security (default: enabled)

variables.name: UNICODE_FORM
variables.label: Unicode normalization form
variables.help: NFC / NFD / NFKC / NFKD

variables.name: HEAVY_MAX_REMOVAL
variables.label: Heavy sanitization: max removal %
variables.help: Maximum percentage (0-100) of text removable during heavy sanitization (default: 60)

variables.name: HEAVY_POLICY
variables.label: Over-limit policy
variables.help: sanitize_if_exceeds | block_if_exceeds

variables.name: NGRAM_MIN
variables.label: N-gram min
variables.help: Shortest substring length for pattern analysis. Smaller = more patterns caught (default: 3)

variables.name: NGRAM_MAX
variables.label: N-gram max
variables.help: Longest substring length for pattern analysis. Larger = longer patterns caught (default: 6)

variables.name: NGRAM_PREFIX_WINDOW
variables.label: N-gram prefix window
variables.help: Number of characters analyzed at input beginning for patterns (default: 96)
